nodes.bodyText: address the issue config is overridden but not restored after a test case finishes. the issue was introduced in a previous ticket limiting address books to the one current to the queried transaction's consensus time
This description mentions 2019-10-11T13_32_41.443132Z.rcd while the error mentions 2019-10-11T13_35_45.120768Z.rcd. Guessing description is wrong?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+{
+  "description": "Stateproof api calls with valid transaction ID but no record file found from node 0.0.4",
+  "extendedDescription": [
+    "When querying stateproof for transaction 0.0.111152-1570800932-629451400, expect to find it in record file ",
+    "2019-10-11T13_32_41.443132Z.rcd with stored node account id 0.0.4 and all 4 signature files exist. However, ",

nodes.bodyText: yes good catch, the description is wrong
nodes.diffHunk:
